sense.name: become different, alter
sense.examples: He has changed from the happy boy I used to know. Love changes everything. Opinions are changing in regards to the issue of gay marriage. That restaurant changes its menu daily. He stopped singing in the choir when his voice started changing.

sense.name: replace
sense.examples: I had to change tires on the side of the freeway. She changed doctors last year. Do we have time to change before dinner? She won't be changing her name when she gets married. I don't think the sheets in my hotel room have been changed.

sense.name: reciprocate
sense.examples: Will you change seats with my daughter so she can see better? He was changing dance partners with Tom all evening.

sense.name: transfer, travel
sense.examples: I could change in Chicago but I'd prefer to fly non-stop. You will be changing trains in Atlanta.
